alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Turner (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 2:44PM MDT until July 10 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Lincoln County in southeastern South Dakota... Southeastern Turner County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 344 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hurley, or 11 miles south of Parker, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hurley and Davis around 355 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Chancellor and Lennox. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
